sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous nous promenons dans le bois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are taking a walk in the woods.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chambre est très confortable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This room is very comfortable.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pendant les vacances d'été, je compte voyager.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I plan to travel during summer vacation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En automne, les feuilles deviennent jaunes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In autumn, the leaves turn yellow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng shuā yīxià nǐ de kǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez passer votre carte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please swipe your card.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez terminer les devoirs à temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please finish the homework on time.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qui est ce beau garçon ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Who is that handsome guy?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ píngzi fàng dào zhuōzi shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez mettre la bouteille sur la table.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please put the bottle on the table.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我可以用信用卡付款吗？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ kěyǐ yòng xìnyòngkǎ fùkuǎn ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Puis-je payer par carte de crédit ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Can I pay by credit card?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il semble ne pas être très content.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He seems unhappy.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il se peut qu'il pleuve demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Maybe it will rain tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shuōfú tā gǎibiàn le zhǔyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je l'ai persuadé de changer d'avis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I persuaded him to change his mind.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo kùzi tài sōng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pantalon est trop large.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These pants are too loose.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō sōngshù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de pins dans le parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many pine trees in the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ bǎ quánbù de qián dōu huā le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai dépensé tout mon argent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I spent all my money.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez utiliser moins de sacs en plastique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please use fewer plastic bags.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce citron est très acide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This lemon is very sour.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǎocān wǒ hē le yī bēi suānnǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Au petit-déjeuner, j'ai bu un yaourt.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I drank a yogurt for breakfast.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yéye hěn téng'ài tā de sūnzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le grand-père aime beaucoup son petit-fils.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Grandfather loves his grandson very much.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa technique est très professionnelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His technique is very professional.
